title: "FOUND" Red Cobb Common Back, PSA only
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: "FOUND" Red Cobb Common Back, PSA only
posts.post_content:
FOUND

Looking to trade for a Nice-for-Grade T206 "PSA" Red Cobb Portrait Common Back.

Looking to trade my T206 Red Cobb Polar Bear Portrait SGC-35/2.5.

I am able to add cash, if necessary.

I also would accept your other T206 HOF PSA Portrait(s) added into in a deal to make it work for both of us. 

Please reply to my email:

[url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

Steve

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/GoBigRed/t206/71202/ty-cobb-red-portrait-polar-bear[/IMG]
